biotools.summary:
A Length-based Multi-species analysis by numerical simulation in R.

Length-Based Multispecies Analysis by Numerical Simulation.

Set up, run and explore the outputs of the Length-based Multi-species model (LeMans; Hall et al. 2006 <doi:10.1139/f06-039>), focused on the marine environment.

LeMaRns is an R package to set up, run and explore the outputs of the Length-based Multi-species model LeMans, focused on the marine environment.

bioschemas.name: LeMaRns
